name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeStyle
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeStyle property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the color, gradient, or pattern to use for the strokes (outlines) around shapes. The default is #000 (black).

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.strokeStyle' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
